item.title: Shakin' Stevens - Merry Christmas Everyone
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Merry Christmas Everyone by Shakin Stevens
Using the chords: G D Em C
Strum Pattern - try D DU U DU (fast) but you will need to alter for the odd chord.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended - original recording by Shakin Stevens
